tasks.label: Add migration
tasks.command: SkipNSwag=true dotnet ef migrations add "${input:name}" -p src/Infrastructure -s src/Web -o Data/Migrations

tasks.label: Update database
tasks.command: dotnet ef database update -p src/Infrastructure -s src/Web

tasks.label: Remove last migration
tasks.command: dotnet ef migrations remove -p src/Infrastructure -s src/Web

tasks.label: Drop database
tasks.command: dotnet ef database drop -p src/Infrastructure -s src/Web --no-build
